root.name: There Came an Echo
root.description: StoryThe game starts with Corrin (voiced by Wil Wheaton), a cryptographer and inventor, being told that his life is danger after he discovers something that, in the right hands, may reveal a shocking secret. He teams up with Miranda, Grace and Syll, as they attempt to uncover the truth. Gameplay:In There Came an Echo you take on the role of commander for a small squad, most of whom have no prior experience in war zones. Using intuitive voice commands, you must guide your squad through each map completing various objectives. The characters will respond realistically to your commands. Audio:There Came an Echo will be fully voice acted and Wil Wheaton will have a prominent role.The game will have an original soundtrack composed by Ronald Jenkees, Jimmy Hinson, and Malukah.
